```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(readr)
library(knitr)
<div class="card"> <h2>Table 1. Plan count by plan type (all plans, 2015)</h2> <div
class="caption">Counts of unique plans by plan type.</div>
t1 <- read_csv("../results/table1_plan_count_all.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)
kable(t1, col.names = c("Plan type", "Number of plans"))

</div> <div class="card"> <h2>Table 2. Plan count by plan type (excluding SNP, EGHP, and 800-series, 2015)</h2> <div class="caption">Same as Table 1, after applying the exclusions.</div>
t2 <- read_csv("../results/table2_plan_count_exclusions.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)
kable(t2, col.names = c("Plan type", "Number of plans"))

</div> <div class="card"> <h2>Table 3. Average enrollment by plan type (all plans, 2015)</h2> <div class="caption">Average enrollment across planâ€“county observations in 2015.</div>
t3 <- read_csv("../results/table3_avg_enroll_all.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)
kable(t3, col.names = c("Plan type", "Average enrollment"), digits = 1)

</div> <div class="card"> <h2>Table 4. Average enrollment by plan type (exclusions + approved service-area counties, 2015)</h2> <div class="caption">Filters from Table 2 plus restriction to counties where plans are approved per service area files.</div>

kable(t4, col.names = c("Plan type", "Average enrollment"), digits = 1)
